source.name: Congressional Correspondence to the FCC
source.description: This table shows letters written by members of Congress to FCC Chairman Julius Genachowski and the commission between January 2010 and October 2011. The letters show lawmakers trying to influence the FCC on a wide set of issues, ranging from AT&T's attempt to merge with T-Mobile to the commission's crafting of net neutrality rules.
